appDescription.message: A Chrome extension to create, edit, and manage JSON-based element locators for web pages.

openEditorBtn.description: Button text in the popup to open the main editor UI.

headerImportBtn.description: Button text for importing a JSON file.

headerExportBtn.description: Button text for exporting a JSON file.

sidebarSupplierPrefix.description: Label for the supplier prefix input field.

sidebarNewLocatorBtn.description: Button text to create a new locator.

sidebarLocatorsHeading.description: Heading for the list of locators.

sidebarDeleteLocatorTitle.description: Tooltip for the delete locator button.

formCreateTitle.description: Title of the form when creating a new locator.

formEditTitle.description: Title of the form when editing an existing locator.

formSaveChangesBtn.description: Button text to save the locator form.

formLabelKey.description: Label for the locator key input field.

formLabelSelector.description: Label for the selector textarea field.

formLabelDescription.description: Label for the locator description field.

formLabelFindBy.description: Label for the 'Find By' strategy dropdown.

formLabelAttribute.description: Label for the 'Attribute to Get' input field.

formLabelIfList.description: Label for the 'If List Found' strategy dropdown.

formLabelMultiSelectorStrategy.description: Label for the multiple selector strategy input field.

formLabelTimeout.description: Label for the timeout input field.

formLabelTimeoutEvent.description: Label for the timeout event type input field.

formPlaceholderKey.description: Placeholder text for the locator key input.

formPlaceholderDescription.message: A brief description of this locator
formPlaceholderDescription.description: Placeholder text for the locator description.

formErrorKeyEmpty.description: Error message when the locator key is left empty.

formCopyTooltip.description: Tooltip for the copy button next to the selector field.

emptyStateSelectLocatorTitle.description: Main title in the empty state view.

emptyStateSelectLocatorSubtitle.description: Subtitle in the empty state view.

emptyStateNoLocatorsTitle.description: Title when the list of locators is completely empty.

emptyStateNoLocatorsSubtitle.description: Subtitle when the list of locators is completely empty.

alertInvalidJson.description: Alert message shown when a user uploads a malformed JSON file.

alertImportSuccess.description: Alert message shown after a successful JSON file import.

confirmDeleteLocator.message: Are you sure you want to delete the locator "$key$"?
confirmDeleteLocator.description: Confirmation message before deleting a locator.
